attributes.action: Provide Covid-19 vaccine to UK citizens living abroad
attributes.additional_details: The UK has a duty to protect it's citizens and should set an example to other countires by vaccinating all UK citizens. UK citizens living abroad often return to UK on a regular basis and therefore to protect the UK further, all UK citizens living abroad should be vaccinated. The French have started already, proving it can be done.
attributes.background: For many UK expatriates obtaining a Covid-19 vaccine is un-certain and can be very difficult - We want the UK government to ease this un-certain situation.
